attributes.action: Make minimum wage the same for all ages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Equal rights, i feel and so does many more that minimum wage should be the same for all ages. We all do the same job, so why should we get treated differently because of our age. What happened to equal rights. Also many employers take advantage of the minimum wage too.
Many young people who work full time come home with hardley anything in their wage because of the low wage it is ridiculous

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
